Text.Page:
Since you're here, , you ought to make yourself useful.

We're out for something really useful: revenge!

The {@LinkCreature:11#2002#Red Lash boarders} killed Canrohl yesterday. Stuck him like a pigling and made him squeal for hours. Horrible stuff.

How about you make them squeal? Tit for tat, eh?
I'll bet you loom large in their nightmares, <PCNAME>.
